text: Want to return headphones but it's personalized/customized. Return policy says final sale for customized items. Arrived with printing error though.
Poor quality after one use qualifies for return. Instead of exchange, I'll refund $249.99 and recommend premium model - higher quality rating. Return label sent.
Lost original packaging for tablet. Can I still return in different box? Item unused, tags attached, perfect resellable condition.
I can ship size Large coffee maker now without waiting for Medium return. Prepaid label sent for Medium. If both fit, return whichever doesn't work.
Ordered wrong size keyboard. Need size Large instead of Medium. Can you send replacement before I return wrong size? Don't want to wait.
Customized items normally final sale, but printing error changes that. This is our mistake. Full refund $249.99 approved, keep defective item.
Returning tablet - poor quality construction, seams split after one use. Want exchange for better quality alternative, not same item again.
Original packaging not required for returns. Use any box to protect item during shipping. As long as item unused with tags, full refund $29.99 approved.
Want to return desk chair but it's personalized/customized. Return policy says final sale for customized items. Arrived with printing error though.
Poor quality after one use qualifies for return. Instead of exchange, I'll refund $139 and recommend professional grade option - higher quality rating. Return label sent.
